attributes.action: STAND ASIDE AND ALLOW THE ENGLISH TO HAVE AN ENGLISH PARLIAMENT OUTSIDE LONDON.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I VIEW THAT WE HAVE BEEN IN HOCK TO LONDONS COUNTERFEIT DEMOCRATIC SYSTEM FOR LONG ENOUGH, IT IS TIME FOR ENGLAND TO BECOME SELF GOVERNING AND CEASE TO BE A MERE INVISIBLE COLONY OF A SELF CENTRED GEOFASCIST WORLD CITY WHICH ONLY LOVES ITSELF. LOOK AT THE WAY THIS ... PETITION IS COUCHED THESE DEMENTED CONTROL FREAK CREATURES DO NOT DESERVE OUR FELICITY - THEY ARE TRAITORS!

rejection.details: Please re-submit without the use of BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
